Recommendation.title: Resolve Unhandled KeyError Exception in API

steps.description: Analyze logs to identify the exact location and key causing the KeyError, providing context for targeted fixes.
Modify code to use try-except blocks or the get() method to handle missing keys gracefully, preventing exceptions.
Integrate tools to capture detailed error information and monitor application performance for proactive issue detection.
Thoroughly test modifications to ensure the KeyError is resolved and application functionality remains intact.
